r.s: Read and write of CSV files
r.d:
Read and write of CSV files as well as discovering the format the CSV file is in.
Supports headers and is excel compatible, i.e. ="0004" outputs as 0004 (only read wise)
For more information on CSV: http://rfc.net/rfc4180.html
r.n: * Fixed Bug #15123: Broken CSV unit tests [dufuz] * Fixed Bug #15233: discoverFormat finds wrong separator [dufuz] * Fixed Bug #18049: discoverFormat bug, Find all seps that are within qoutes [dufuz] * Fixed Bug #18111: discoverFormat: Quote not detected in short lines [dufuz] * Fixed Bug #18358: Headers incorrectly being applied to quoted rows only [dufuz]
